mean_cn: n. 拾起，获得，皮卡，敞篷小型运货卡车
mean_en: a vehicle with low sides and no roof at the back used, for example, by farmers; a person somebody meets for the first time, for example in a bar, with whom they start a sexual relationship; an improvement; an occasion when somebody/something is collected; the part of a record player or musical instrument that changes electrical signals into sound, or sound into electrical signals; a vehicle’s ability to accelerate (= increase in speed)
word_etyma: pick捡 + up向上 → pickup拾起，获得；皮卡，敞篷小型运货卡车
